synopsis.code:
mal_block_listing = element listing { attribute style { xsd:NMTOKENS } ?, attribute * - (mal:* | local:*) { text } *,
mal_title ?, mal_block_desc ?, mal_block + }

item.p: The listing element contains an optional title element, an optional desc element, and any general block content.
The listing element can occur in any general block context, including inside pages, sections, and certain block elements.
The style attribute takes a space-separated list of style hints. Processing tools should adjust their behavior according to those style hints they understand.
The listing element can have attributes from external namespaces. See for more information on external-namespace attributes.
